cause.description:
join the cause to save love, for its poluting the minds of the youth, knowing nothing about it...so stop the racist gouvernment, the racist people,power hungry tyrants, hatefull killers, fighters and wars!! The world needs LOVE, and without it, as you can see, its goin to hell, "When the power of love overcomes the love of power, the world will know peace" power to the hippies!!!
1. hatrid must stop, its killing us all
cause.mission: Save our world from killing eachother out
cause.name: Save The Love
